summary: This bill, the "Relieving Economic Strain to Enhance American Resilience and Competitiveness in Higher Education and Research Act" (RESEARCHER Act), mandates the Director of the Office of Science and Technology Policy (OSTP) to create policy guidelines for federal research agencies. These guidelines aim to address financial instability among graduate and postdoctoral researchers, covering stipends, healthcare, housing, food security, childcare, and transportation. The bill also includes provisions for data collection, a National Academies assessment, and a Government Accountability Office (GAO) study to monitor progress and provide recommendations.
